title: Anchoring (Jacowitz & Kahneman, 1995)
context: from 3 questions about 15 topics -> 1 question about four topics

title: Quote Attribution (Lorge & Curtis, 1936).
context: from a list of quotations to only the 1 of interest

title: Sex differences in implicit math attitudes and relations with self-reported attitudes (Nosek, Banaji, & Greenwald, 2002).
context: From four IATs to 1 IAT in replications

title: DISGUST SENSITIVITY PREDICTS INTUITIVE DISAPPROVAL OF GAYS (Inbar, Pizarro, Knobe & Bloom, 2009, Study 1)
context: Initial study used 6 items from an 8-item short scale, 25-item four factor scale suggested by original authors, but 5-item subscale of specific factor of interest

title: DEVELOPMENT OF PROSOCIAL, INDIVIDUALISTIC, AND COMPETITIVE ORIENTATIONS: THEORY AND PRELIMINARY EVIDENCE (Van Lange, Otten, De Bruin & Joireman, 1997, Study 3)
A DISSOCIATION BETWEEN MORAL JUDGMENTS AND JUSTIFICATIONS (Hauser, Cushman, Young, Kang-Xing & Mikhail, et al., 2007, Scenarios 1+2)
context: Original research had 19 scenarios, replication participants got randomly assigned to 1 control and 3 moral dilemmas from the set of 19

title: It feels like yesterday: self­esteem, valence of personal past experiences, and judgments of subjective distance (Ross, & Wilson, 2002, Study 2)
context: from a 10-item scale, to single-item scale.

title: Stroop task (Stroop, 1935; as adapted from Inzlicht, & Gutsell, 2007, Study 1)
. Issue involvement can increase or decrease persuasion by enhancing message­relevant cognitive responses (Cacioppo, Petty, & Morris, 1983, Study 1)
The Relation between Persistence and Conscientiousness (De Fruyt, Van De Wiele, & Van Heeringen, 2000)
context: Compared to the 'longer lists of anagrams used' in previous research (226 for 4 dimensions) on the topic, they switched to a shorter 4 anagram task of the 1 dimension of interest.

title: Vohs, K. & Schooler, J. (2008). The value of believing in free will: Encouraging a belief in determinism increases cheating.
context: Original measure assessed 4 constructs with 24 item, For the replication they switched to a different scale measuring the 1 construct relevant to the effect using 7 items.
